amendment.description: Amendment sought to require disclosure of the information under the bill only if that information is material information for investors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 116-237 to require disclosure of the information under the bill only if that information is material information for investors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 224 (Roll no. 566).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hill (AR).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 224 (Roll no. 566).
